mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar(calendarno, labeldate, label, title, content, cnt, seqno, regdate, user_no) VALUES (calendar_seq.nextval, #{labeldate}, #{label}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, 1, sysdate, #{user_no})
mapper.select: SELECT calendarno, labeldate, label, title, content, cnt, seqno, regdate, user_no FROM calendar ORDER BY labeldate DESC, seqno ASC
SELECT calendarno, labeldate, label, seqno FROM calendar WHERE SUBSTR(labeldate, 1, 7) = #{labeldate} ORDER BY labeldate ASC, seqno ASC
SELECT calendarno, labeldate, label, seqno FROM calendar WHERE labeldate = #{labeldate} ORDER BY seqno ASC
